last_episode_to_air.name: Bigfoot on Camera
last_episode_to_air.overview: The AIMS team meets with a familiar face, who sheds light on what Trapper was doing in the Tygart Valley all those decades ago. And Trapper is smiling down proudly on his Appalachian sons when the team uncovers explosive new evidence of Bigfoot.

name: Mountain Monsters
overview: Professional hillbilly hunters search for mysterious creatures that people have claimed to have seen in West Virginia.

episodes.name: Wolfman of Wolfe County
episodes.overview: Following eyewitness leads and a trail of fresh physical evidence, the AIMS team embarks on a quest to capture the elusive Kentucky Wolfman. This 500-pound, 7-foot-tall wolf monster has supposedly been terrifying residents in, fittingly, Wolfe County, and locals are demanding answers.

episodes.name: Grassman of Perry County
episodes.overview: Discovering an eyewitness video of the Ohio Grassman, the AIMS team travels to Southeastern Ohio to hunt down this 1,000-pound, 8-foot-tall cousin of the legendary Sasquatch, which was dubbed the Grassman because its fur reportedly resembles the color and texture of grass.

episodes.name: Devil Dog of Logan County
episodes.overview: Something in Logan County, West Virginia, is wreaking havoc on its population of coyotes â€“ the former top of the food chain. AIMS has a theory, and suspects the legendary Devil Dog is to blame, sucking the blood and life from the coyotes.

episodes.name: Wampus Beast of Pleasants County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Raleigh County, West Virginia, to investigate a killer bear-canine hybrid called the "Red-Eyed Bear Beast." The team tracks the creature across treacherous terrain and rivers and attempts to capture it inside of a caldron trap.

episodes.name: Mothman of Mason County
episodes.overview: For decades Mason County, West Virginia has been terrorized by a flying Mothman and it appears he is back again. Now a group of expert hunters and trappers are using their backwoods knowledge to catch the Mothman once and for all.

episodes.name: Lizard Demon of Wood County
episodes.overview: Wood County, West Virginia has a fresh trail of evidence that a reptile-human hybrid, the Lizard Demon, is roaming the woods. Now a group of expert hunters and trappers are using their backwoods knowledge to catch the Lizard Demon.

episodes.name: Kentucky Hellhound of Pike County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Pike County, Kentucky, to investigate a huge canine predator who is menacing the local farming community. The team meets with eyewitnesses and races to construct a giant bamboo box trap before the creature migrates for the winter.

episodes.name: Grafton Monster of Taylor County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Taylor County, West Virginia, to investigate a huge bipedal predator nicknamed the "Headless Horror." The team meets with eyewitnesses, tracks the creature, and attempts to capture it inside of a massive wooden trap.

episodes.name: Yahoo of Nicholas County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Nicholas County, West Virginia, to investigate a large Bigfoot-like creature called "The Yahoo." The team meets with eyewitnesses, tracks the beast, and attempts to capture it inside of a giant log-fall trap.

episodes.name: Werewolf of Webster County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Webster County, West Virginia, to investigate the legendary Webster Werewolf, a massive wolf-like creature with ancient mythical ties. The team meets with eyewitnesses and works to complete a pit-trap before the full moon passes.

episodes.name: Fire Dragon of Pocahontas County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Pocahontas County, West Virginia, to investigate a gigantic, aquatic reptile called the "Fire Dragon." The team meets with eyewitnesses and constructs an elaborate water trap before pursuing the creature on land and boat.

episodes.name: Sheepsquatch of Boone County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Boone County, West Virginia, to investigate a bizarre and aggressive creature called "The Sheepsquatch." The team meets with eyewitnesses and builds a custom razor wire trap before embarking upon a perilous night hunt.

episodes.name: Shadow Creature of Braxton County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Braxton County, West Virginia, to investigate a clandestine killer known as "The Shadow Creature." The team rappels cliffs and navigates the big timber as they chase the monster toward a super-sized snare trap.

episodes.name: Wild Bill's Bear Beast
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travels to Raleigh County, West Virginia, to investigate a killer bear-canine hybrid called the "Red-Eyed Bear Beast." The team tracks the creature across treacherous terrain and rivers and attempts to capture it inside of a caldron trap.

episodes.name: Death Cat of Cherokee County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Cherokee County, North Carolina, to investigate a ferocious feline called "The Cherokee Death Cat." The team works to unravel the myth surrounding the creature and attempts to capture it inside of a complex wooden trap.

episodes.name: Snallygaster of Preston County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Preston County, West Virginia, to investigate a huge flying predator called "The Snallygaster." The team encounters great danger when they invade the creature's territory and attempt to capture it inside of a large wooden box trap.

episodes.name: Cave Creature of Greenbrier County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Greenbrier County, West Virginia, to investigate a humanoid bipedal called "The Cave Creature." The team tracks the elusive creature through a twenty-mile cave system toward a series of snare traps.

episodes.name: Hogzilla of Hocking Hills
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to the treacherous terrain of Hocking Hills, Ohio, to investigate a huge hog-like creature called "Hogzilla." After meeting with eyewitnesses, the team races to capture the beast inside of a massive steel cage trap.

episodes.name: Bloodless Howler of Harrison County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Harrison County, West Virginia, to investigate a vicious canine-feline hybrid known as "The Bloodless Howler." The team tracks the predator toward their Asian tiger-box trap in frigid temperatures.

episodes.name: Grassman's Revengeance
episodes.overview: In the two-hour season finale, the AIMS team travel back to Perry County, Ohio, to settle an unfinished score with a massive Bigfoot-like creature. The team works to unravel the mystery of the Ohio Grassman's identity and faces their greatest danger yet.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Central Kentucky
episodes.overview: The Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings begin their epic quest to prove the existence of Bigfoot in the Appalachia as they head out to Central Kentucky after what they believe is the first Bigfoot to emerge from the Mammoth Cave System.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Putnam County
episodes.overview: Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings travel to Putnam County, WV to investigate the Chupacabra, known as the West Virginia Vampire. The team must meet with eyewitnesses and build an elaborate maze trap in an attempt to capture the creature.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Eastern Kentucky
episodes.overview: Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings travel to Eastern Kentucky to investigate the Wildman, known as the most dangerous and aggressive Bigfoot in the region. The team searches for a missing eyewitness and builds the largest and strongest trap.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Lincoln County
episodes.overview: Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings travel to Lincoln County, WV to investigate the Hellhound who left a bad taste in their mouth after evading them last autumn.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Clay County
episodes.overview: The investigators travel to Clay County, W.Va., looking for the "yahoo" who threw trees at them and destroyed their trap last fall. The team must build an electrified trap to contain this Bigfoot.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Washington County
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Washington County, Pa., investigating reports of a fast and agile Bigfoot known as the "Dustman," which they plan to capture by repelling down a cliff at night to its cave lair and then luring it to a quicksand pit trap.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Ashe County: AIMS Under Attack
episodes.overview: The AIMS team head to Ashe County, NC in search of "The Cherokee Devil". This Bigfoot is thought to possess mind control abilities. When Buck has an encounter with the creature the team fights back, only to have another team member fall under its spell.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Ashe County: AIMS Erupts
episodes.overview: The AIMS team go back to Ashe County, NC to hunt the "Cherokee Devil" a savage Bigfoot that has already scarred members of the team. As the mission continues the biggest rift in AIMS history erupts and some members debate hanging up their gear for good.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Harrison County: Stonish Giant
episodes.overview: Investigators travel to Harrison County, Ohio, in the Season 4 premiere to look into the legend of the Stonish Giant, which Native American folklore describes as a Bigfoot with a coat of fur so thick that it cannot be pierced by arrows.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Central Kentucky: Squalling Savage
episodes.overview: The AIMS team travel to Central Kentucky to search for the Squalling Savage, believed by locals to be at war with another Bigfoot clan.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Blair County: Lightning Man
episodes.overview: The AIMS team heads to Blair County, PA looking for a Bigfoot known as the "Lightning Man". After meeting the eyewitnesses, the team believes that the key to this investigation may be a  Native American lightning symbol hidden inside a secluded barn.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Blair County: Thunder Brothers
episodes.overview: After discovering a carved stone the last time they were in Blair County,  PA, the AIMS team returns looking for answers.  While meeting with a Bigfoot expert the team realizes that they uncovered somethign that was not meant to be unearthed.

episodes.name: Scariest Moments
episodes.overview: The AIMS team revisits the most terrifying moments from their epic investigations. Highlights include the Hellhound, Cherokee Death Cat, Cave Creature, Bear Beast, Shadow Creature and the massive Hogzilla.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Wirt County: The Ash Man
episodes.overview: The team build their biggest trap to date in order to capture a Bigfoot known as the Ash Man, which Huckleberry recalls having witnessed on his family's farm in Wirt County, W.Va., nearly 50 years ago.

episodes.name: Bifgoot of Lee County: Raven Mocker
episodes.overview: The team travel to Lee County, Va., in search of a Bigfoot feared most by the Cherokee people. After devising a Raven Wing Trap, they come face to face with something they cannot explain, leading them to believe there is something truly evil haunting the forests of Virginia.

episodes.name: Best of Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The AIMS team revisit some thrilling moments from their Bigfoot quest. The list includes: the graveyard of the Midnight Whistler; the Wildman; the Yahoo; the Dustman; and the most mysterious Cherokee Devil.

episodes.name: Raven Mocker: Back to Trapper
episodes.overview: The AIMS team reunite with Trapper to get his opinion on how they should take on the legendary Raven Mocker.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Wood County: The Phantom of the Forest
episodes.overview: The team travel to Wood County, W.Va., searching for a Bigfoot known as the Phantom of the Forest, but soon find themselves in a feud with local poachers who are armed and out for blood.

episodes.name: Return of the Rogue Team
episodes.overview: While AIMS hunt the Ohio Grassman, they come to realize that they are being tracked by a rogue team whose identity they intend to reveal.

episodes.name: AIMS vs. the Rogue Team
episodes.overview: AIMS continue to investigate the true identity of the rogue team, but reach a point where they must consider whether this game of cat and mouse is worth the risks, or if they should finally admit defeat and back down.

episodes.name: The Rogue Team Rises: Part 1
episodes.overview: After 9 months of silence, the Rogue Team emerges from the shadows after team member Buck tries to take matters into his own hands. The AIMS team meets face to face with this other mysterious team to find out who they are and what they are after.

episodes.name: The Rogue Team Rises: Part 2
episodes.overview: After being abducted, the AIMS team faces a mysterious man who offers them a deal with an incredible payoff. The team suddenly realizes Trapper is missing and they set off to locate him in a race against time after finding a trail of his blood.

episodes.name: Enter The Dark Forest
episodes.overview: The AIMS team enters the Dark Forest to capture the Woman of the Woods. The Dark Forest has a grip around Jeff and they realize that this is the home to not only the Woman of the Woods and a Bigfoot, but another mysterious creature: the Black Wolf.

episodes.name: The Black Wolf
episodes.overview: The AIMS team learns that a mysterious creature known as the Black Wolf roams the Dark Forest. A shaman shows up at their basecamp and reveals that the Black Wolf's presence may spell disaster for Jeff whose behavior continues to trouble the team.

episodes.name: Superfan Edition
episodes.overview: The AIMS team answers all of your superfan questions about their favorite traps, scariest cryptid creatures and which monster they think could take down a Bigfoot! Special appearances by: Snallygaster; Fire Dragon; and the notorious Cherokee Devil.

episodes.name: Huckleberry's Predator
episodes.overview: After the AIMS team is split in half, Jeff must come up with answers about the Dark Forest. While the team gets proof of the Black Wolf, Huckleberry reveals that a mysterious creature is stalking the team and finds himself in a fight for his life.

episodes.name: The Three Rings Of The North
episodes.overview: After a shocking discovery, Buck heads into the Dark Forest and encounters someone from his past. Huckleberry realizes that the predator he faced off with wants revenge. The team follows a trail left by Jeff and discovers the mysterious Three Rings.

episodes.name: The Secret Of The Little Girl
episodes.overview: The team discovers what Jeff was doing at the Three Rings. Buck shows the team what he found on his phone and finds out this other team is after him. He heads to the Three Rings to contact the Little Girl, who seems to be the key to the Dark Forest.

episodes.name: The Blood Skull And Woman Of The Woods
episodes.overview: Buck searches for the Little Girl after he makes contact with her and she vanishes. While the rest of the AIMS team sneaks into a cabin looking for answers about the other team's intentions, Buck winds up face to face with the Woman of the Woods.

episodes.name: The Waya Woman of Jackson County
The Secret of the Blue House
The Silver Giant of Boone County
The Mystery of the Death Cat Barn
The Secret of the Red Shed
The Twisted Torch
episodes.overview: The AIMS team searches for Jeff after he is drawn away by a mysterious cloaked figure. Their frantic hunt leads them to a pair of finely crafted torches that shed light on the Cherokee folklore surrounding Spearfinger.

episodes.name: The Wolves of West Virginia
episodes.overview: The surviving members of AIMS head out on a brand-new adventure that team leader Trapper set up for them before he passed. Equipped with Trapper's journal, they travel to the mountains of the Tygart Valley to prove there are still wolves in West Virginia.

episodes.name: K-9 Tracks By The Grave
episodes.overview: The AIMS team devises an ingenious way to identify a mysterious predator.

episodes.name: The Red-eyed Beast
episodes.overview: The AIMS teams brave a blizzard to track a massive red-eyed creature.

episodes.name: The Great Skull Wall
episodes.overview: A monstrous roar leads the AIMS team to a landmark unlike any other.

episodes.name: What's A Smoke Wolf?
episodes.overview: The team unearths more questions than answers about the red-eyed beast.

episodes.name: The Coyote Killing Massacre
episodes.overview: The team treads on dangerous ground while hunting down the Smoke Wolves.

episodes.name: Day of Wrath
episodes.overview: The AIMS team finds a decades-old clue etched in stone by Trapper.

episodes.name: The Den of the Smoke Wolves
episodes.overview: The team seeks to solve the mystery of the Tygart Valley once and for all.

episodes.name: Bigfoot or Bust
episodes.overview: The team heads back to the Tygart Valley on a mission to prove that a Bigfoot roams those mysterious hollers; a rumbling sound from deep in the hills gets the guys moving, and they stumble upon a strange tree structure.

episodes.name: Cow-Killing Bastard
episodes.overview: Things heat up for the team when Buck realizes that the legendary Grafton Monster has migrated to the Tygart Valley. It's a monster hunt unlike any other when they stumble across the mutilated carcass of a cow.

episodes.name: Bloodbath in the Woods
episodes.overview: The team comes in hot onto a cattle farm after realizing the Grafton Monster is hunting livestock; they then set off on a mission to hunt for what they believe is the cryptozoic creature's most recent victim and encounter an absolute bloodbath.

episodes.name: Huckleberry's Monster
episodes.overview: Huckleberry reveals his family's terrifying brush with the Grafton Monster. Later, Jeff breaks out his "hillbilly hazmat suit" to do some bloodwork on an old dog collar. And Buck gets into a hellacious fistfight with locals under the moonlight.

episodes.name: World's Biggest Bigfoot Nest
episodes.overview: The AIMS team gets a hot lead on a massive Bigfoot nest hidden in the hills of the Tygart Valley. With some help from tech wizard Cowboy Ken, the boys take to the skies to scout out the exact location and uncover their best Bigfoot evidence to date.

episodes.name: A Monster Turf War
episodes.overview: The AIMS team members find themselves in the middle of a turf war in No Manâ€™s Land between the Grafton Monster, Bigfoot and a pack of Smoke Wolves; the team then searches for the source of a mysterious rumbling in the hills of the Tygart Valley.

episodes.name: Rumble in the Hills
episodes.overview: The search is on to find a lost brother when an AIMS team member goes missing somewhere in the hidden hills of the Tygart Valley; after hearing gunshots, the team makes a shocking discovery and must evacuate Willy from the woods.
The team heads out on a night hunt for smoke wolves after encountering a herd of fleeing cattle and a mutilated calf; the team learns new information about Trapper.

episodes.name: Bigfoot on Camera
episodes.overview: The AIMS team meets with a familiar face, who sheds light on what Trapper was doing in the Tygart Valley all those decades ago. And Trapper is smiling down proudly on his Appalachian sons when the team uncovers explosive new evidence of Bigfoot.
